title: Conda is moving to Mastodon & LinkedIn
description: Conda is retiring its Twitter account. Please join us on Mastodon and LinkedIn

title: November 2023 Releases
description: Conda 23.11.0, conda-build 3.28.0/3.28.1, and conda-libmamba-solver 23.11.0/23.11.1 have been released! 🎉

title: Conda 23.10.0: libmamba is now the default solver
description: 🚄 The speedy conda-libmamba-solver becomes the default solver in the Conda 23.10.0 release. Please fasten your seat belts.

title: September 2023 Releases
description: Conda 23.9.0, conda-build 3.27.0, conda-libmamba-solver 23.9.0/23.9.1, conda-index 0.3.0, and pycosat 0.6.5/0.6.6 have been released! 🎉

title: Conda Newsletter, Issue #2
description: Upcoming Events, conda-store brief, Is conda free?, pre and post plugin hooks, Recent releases, Travis Hathaway's latest talk on Youtube.
